Title: Spring Cloud Function SpEL Code Injection
Description: Remote code execution via SpEL injection in Spring Cloud Function
Solution: Upgrade to Spring Cloud Function 3.1.7 or 3.2.3
Proof: Spring Cloud Function 3.1.6 detected on port 8080

Title: Apache Log4j Remote Code Execution
Description: Remote code execution via JNDI lookup in Log4j

Title: Progress MOVEit Transfer SQL Injection
Description: SQL injection vulnerability in MOVEit Transfer

Title: Jenkins CLI Arbitrary File Read
Description: Arbitrary file read via Jenkins CLI

Title: Adobe Commerce Improper Input Validation
Description: Improper input validation in Adobe Commerce
Solution: Upgrade to latest Adobe Commerce version
